problem.markdown:
Select whether each element is an acid or a base, as it relates to base saturation in soils:
>>aluminum<< [[(acid), base]]
>>calcium<< [[acid, (base)]]
>>magnesium<< [[acid,(base)]]
[explanation] The soil forming bases are calcium, magnesium, potassium and sodium. The soil acids are hydrogen and aluminum. [explanation]
